import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{supabase}from"../supabase";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();// If already logged in, redirect to dashboard
useEffect(()=>{const checkUser=async()=>{const{data:{session}}=await supabase.auth.getSession();if(session){navigate("/dashboard");}};checkUser();},[navigate]);const signupWithGoogle=async()=>{const{error}=await supabase.auth.signInWithOAuth({provider:"google",options:{redirectTo:"http://localhost:3000/dashboard"}});if(error){console.error("Signup error:",error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger mt-3",onClick:signupWithGoogle,children:"Sign up with Google"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-3 text-muted",children:"We use Google authentication for secure access."})]});};export default Signup;
